description.en:
High school girl Luna Amano waits for her missing sister and runs a flower shop alone. However, the flower shop is suddenly burned down by the landlord Gokudo. When tragedy is imminent, memories that do not exist in her mind come back. A cold-blooded fresh-blooded JK gun action with transcendent drawing power released by an up-and-coming artist!

Version français : 

Après la disparition soudaine de sa grande sœur, Luna Amano, une jeune lycéenne, tient seule la boutique de fleurs de cette dernière, espérant toujours son retour. Jusqu'au jour où des yakuzas incendient la boutique pour s’emparer du terrain. Au cœur de cette tragédie, des souvenirs et des compétences de survie qui ne devraient pas exister ressurgissent en elle. Désormais, elle devra tuer pour retrouver sa sœur.

altTitles.en: Yell for the Blue Sky

altTitles.th: กู่เสียงฝันให้ก้องฟ้า

altTitles.ja: 青空エール

description.en: Aozora Yell centers on Tsubasa, a girl who saw an inspirational brass band performance at the finals of the Japanese high school baseball championships one summer. Tsubasa vows to join the band when she enters high school, and she happens to meet a certain boy there.
description.pt-br: A história gira em torno de Tsubasa, que viu uma apresentação de uma banda de metais nas finais do campeonato Japonês de beisebol em um verão. Tsubasa promete se juntar a banda quando entrar no colegial, e acontece dela conhecer um garoto que tem objetivos parecidos com os dela e os dois se esforçam para realizar seus sonhos.

description.en: A mysterious circus. A missing friend. A dangerous deal. Julia Lazarrett is happy with her honest, predictable life. But when her best friend Kamille convinces her to visit a travelling circus, they both get more than for which they bargained. Thrust into a world full of secrets, magic, and death, Julia finds herself presented with the most horrific of deals in order to survive.

altTitles.ja: ボツ子ちゃん
没キャラ

description.en: "Botsu" as in "rejected/unused concept"

altTitles.en: Helck Volundio
Helck: Völundio ~Surreal Sword Saga~

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.en: Verndio - Surreal Sword Saga
Völundio ~Divergent Sword Saga~

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

A hot-tempered Taoist priest finds himself entangled with an arrogant vampire, drawn into a whirlwind of love and hatred fueled by karmic ties from their past lives.

In the present day, he’s barely scraping by, working odd jobs on a film set. But one day, he senses a powerful, ominous energy. When he looks up, he’s shocked to find that the source is none other than the nation’s biggest movie star, Shen Que?! The charming and sophisticated actor the world admires—is actually a thousand-year-old vampire?

“You’re not getting away from me this time!”

altTitles.en: Prince of Tennis

altTitles.ja: テニスの王子様

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - UmaYome Uma X Tore♂ Kekkon Seikatsu Goudou (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: UmaYome ~Horse & Trainer Wedded Bliss~

altTitles.ja: ウマ嫁　ウマ×トレ♂結婚生活合同

description.en: An anthology book series containing many different artists and their favorite Umas enjoying their life after marriage.

altTitles.ja: 春雷は、あきらめない

description.en:
Novelist Sakuya decides to live in the countryside at his grandfather's house after his death. On the day of the move, a young man appeared when he was tidying up while immersing himself in memories...?

[Source](https://x.com/daria_fwinc/status/1849028007736058354)

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

altTitles.en: Best Wishes, Bitch

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.vi:
"T-tớ đã cắm sừng cậu, không chỉ một anh đâu...là ba anh lận cơ!"
Những câu nói như gai sắt cứa vào tim cậu từ cuối cấp hai năm ấy vẫn còn làm cậu ám ảnh. Akiyoshi Sunao, hiện tại cậu đã trở thành sinh viên năm nhất và làm thành viên của câu lạc bộ phim ảnh, cậu còn nỗi ám ảnh kia là từ mối tình đầu hồi cuối cấp hai của cậu, Lemon Nishikawa. Cậu đã mất niềm tin vào tình yêu suốt cả cao trung, đến khi lên đại học thì anh đã phải lòng crush mới hơn mình một tuổi tên Kogahara Natsumi. Ngay khi cậu nghĩ mình đã suýt thì "move on" và tìm được tình yêu mới để tận hưởng thanh xuân, "Cô bạn" bắt cá bốn tay năm nào lại vô tình xuất hiện. Khoảnh khắc ấy, những câu nói chí mạng như hiện về cứa cậu thêm phát nữa...Cậu đã cố gắng lảng tránh cô người yêu cũ ấy và cổ vũ bản thân vượt lên sự kiện mọc sừng ấy. Cậu suýt thì thành công...
"S-sao mình lại biến thành ghệ cũ của mình?!"
Cậu đã bị hoán đổi linh hồn với chính cô nàng người yêu cũ ấy, và đối phương cũng nhận ra điều đó. Họ phải làm gì để vượt qua nghịch cảnh? Liệu họ có nhìn nhận lại những góc khuất của nhau? Và liệu họ có trở lại với nhau? Mời các bạn đọc truyện nhé!~

Fun fact: Tiêu đề tiếng Nhật của truyện này có thể được dịch thẳng là "Hạnh Phúc Nhé, Con Đĩ!"
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

altTitles.ja: 俺たち新婚なので

description.en: Childhood friend lovestory

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

altTitles.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
description.ja:
どんなつらい時でも、見ていてくれる「誰か」がいる。

この世に未練を残してさまよっていた幽霊は、ある日、仕事に疲れた会社員、野崎と出会う。

「俺のことなんて、誰も見てないんだ…」

孤独感に打ちひしがれる野崎。人生の最後に一人ぼっちだった幽霊は、彼の生活を見守ってみることに。仕事に翻弄されながらも必死に日々を送る野崎。やがて彼に新たな出会いが訪れる。忙しない日々の中でこぼれ落ちてしまった気持ちを、野崎は人との関わりの中で、少しずつ取り戻していく――。

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

altTitles.ja: さらば、漫画よ

altTitles.en: Farewell, Manga
Goodbye, Manga

description.en: Minazo, an eight-year old boy living in Tokyo during the times of scorching heat, is saddened by his parents’ divorce and family separation while he seeks comfort in the popular manga Mokumoku Man. It’s author, Shishio, much like Minazo, is unable to fulfill that certain hole in his heart. Together, where will the chaotic world woven by their thoughts and prayers lead?

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.en: An Ordinary Light Music Club

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game
No Exit Horror

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Douran no Joshou-hen

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High - Upheaval Prologue Arc

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 動乱の序章編

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High - Prologue of Disturbance Arc

description.en:
March 2097—Brazil deploys the strategic-class spell Synchroliner Fusion in South America, starting a wave of unrest that will reach as far as Japan, where the new school year is just beginning. Tatsuya and Miyuki have entered their third year at First High, but anti-magician sentiment has been steadily rising. As many young scions of the twenty-eight families gather to discuss what to do about the concerning political climate, a much more immediate threat sits just beyond the shores of Sado Island…

Adaption of Light Novel 21-22.

title.en: Tensei ni Hakobijin no Isekai Kouryakuhou

altTitles.ja: 転生荷運び人の異世界攻略法

altTitles.en: A Reincarnated Carrier's Strategy for Another World
The Way To Conquer A Different World As A Reincarnated Porter

altTitles.id: Strategi Menghadapi Dunia Lain oleh Seorang Carrier yang Bereinkarnasi

altTitles.vi: Người vận chuyển dị thế giới

description.en: A man who yearns for freedom is reincarnated and he chooses the undesirable job "Carrier"--The fastest way to conquer both women and other world with wisdom and courage!
description.ja: 戦闘力がほとんどなく最弱といわれるが、固有スキルとして収納スキルを持つジョブ「荷運び人」。セイは、転生にあたり多数の選択肢から、そんな「荷運び人」を選ぶ。その理由は、たくさんのアイテムを不自由なく持って、ひとりで気ままに世界を旅したいからというものだった。そんなセイが出会ったのは、純粋で無垢な僧侶・ルナミリア。危なっかしいルナミリアを放っておけず、セイは成り行きでパーティーを組むことになる。

title.en: Yojouhan Ohi ~Marie Antoinette - Tensei Ohi no Yarinaoshi~

altTitles.ja: 四畳半王妃～マリー・アントワネット　転生王妃のやり直し～

altTitles.en: 4.5 Tatami Mat Queen: Marie Antoinette: Reincarnated Queen's Redo

description.en: A Lolita-loving high school girl and the tragic Queen Marie-Antoinette in modern Japan. Born, raised and raised differently, the encounter between these two girls changes history.
description.ja: 悲劇の王妃マリー・アントワネットは処刑の瞬間。「誰も自分を知らない世界でやり直したい」と願った。その結果、若かりし少女の姿で現代日本に“転生”してしまったようで…？マリーが“転生”した先にいたのは、育ってきた環境から自己肯定感が低く、ロリータファッションを堂々と着こなせない自分を好きになれずにいる女子高生。時代も生まれ育ちも何もかも違う二人が現代日本で出会った時、ロリータファッションを通じて少女と歴史が変わっていく――

title.en: Elf Tensei Kara no Cheat Kenkokuki

altTitles.ja: エルフ転生からのチート建国記

altTitles.en: From Elf Reincarnation to Cheat Kingdom Founding Chronicle

altTitles.pt-br: Da Reencarnação dos Elfos à Crônica da Fundação do Reino Cheat

description.en:
A genius magician, to fight against his fate to die a natural death from old age, grasped at the truth of magic to allow himself to reincarnate with a power he created himself. The cycle of reincarnation is repeated multiple times and in his 31st reincarnation, the magician became a boy named Syril who lives in a village of elves.   
  
However, that village is ruled by Humans, and the Elves are treated as cattle. After becoming 14 years old, Cyril, who regained his past knowledge and experience, stands up to help a girl, Lucie, who is his childhood friend. The story of the creation of an ideal country begins in that one village, a place where all races can coexist. Elves, Fox-girl, and various other Heroines.
description.ja: 天才魔術師が、記憶を残して輪廻転生する魔術を作り上げた。彼は転生を繰り返し、31周目の世界でエルフの村に住む少年シリルとなる。しかし、その村は人間によって支配され、エルフは日々虐げられていた。幼馴染の少女ルシエを救うため、あらゆる種族が共存する理想の国家を作ろうと、天才魔術師が今、立ち上がる!!
description.pt-br:
Um mago gênio, para lutar contra seu destino de morrer de morte natural de velhice, agarrou a verdade da magia para se permitir reencarnar com um poder que ele mesmo criou. O ciclo de reencarnação é repetido várias vezes e em sua 31ª reencarnação, o mago se tornou um menino chamado Syril que vive em uma vila de elfos.

No entanto, essa vila é governada por humanos, e os elfos são tratados como gado. Depois de completar 14 anos, Cyril, que recuperou seus conhecimentos e experiências do passado, se levanta para ajudar uma garota, Lucie, que é sua amiga de infância. A história da criação de um país ideal começa naquela aldeia, um lugar onde todas as raças podem coexistir. Elfos, Raposas e várias outras Heroínas

title.en: The Ice Princess Wants to Be Melted by a Small Patch of Sunlight

altTitles.ja: 氷の姫は小さな陽だまりでとかされたい

altTitles.ja-ro: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai

altTitles.pt-br: A Princesa de Gelo Quer Ser Derretida por um Pequeno Raio de Sol

description.en: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".
description.ja:
多忙な両親に代わり、保育園児の弟妹を世話する男子高校生の青葉実晴は、恋愛をする暇はないが、弟妹と楽しく過ごしていた。ある日、クラスメートで「氷の姫様」と呼ばれるクール美女・水鳥雪の自宅で遊ぶことになった青葉は、「私を笑顔にしてくれませんか？」と水鳥に頼まれて…！？ 

幼い弟妹を大切に想う高校生たちの青春ラブコメ開幕！
description.pt-br: Aoba é um estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio que cuida de seus irmãos mais novos no lugar de seus pais ocupados e acaba indo a um encontro de brincadeiras para irmãos na casa de sua colega Mizudori, uma beleza fria conhecida como a "Princesa de Gelo".

altTitles.ja: 11番目のねこはねね

description.en:
Nene is a tiny waitress in a country where cat people live. She looks like a kitten, but she has a big dream and a secret...?

Let's start a thrilling life as a cat, as nene learns "cat-ness" from her seniors!
description.ja:
猫人の住む猫人國。

密入国は重罪だが、ねずみの子であるネネは、とある目標のためにリスクを覚悟でこの國へと忍び込んでいた。ネネは美猫揃いの雷雷茶楼で新入りとして働きながら、先輩たちから“猫らしさ”を学ぼうと奮闘するが…。

altTitles.ja: ガルルガール

description.en: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...
description.es: Tras ingresar a la preparatoria, el joven, Mochizuki, se reencuentra con su primer amor, Kawa. Aunque Kawa ha crecido y se ha convertido en una hermosa y refinada jovencita, la extraña proximidad entre ellos no ha cambiado desde sus días de travesuras. Poco después de ingresar a la escuela, Mochizuki se encuentra incómodo con la transformación de Kawa en la flor inalcanzable del campus, pero un incidente desencadena el descubrimiento de su 'secreto'. La verdadera identidad de la chica de su primer amor resulta ser una chica lobo. ¿Cómo cambiará esto su relación? ¡Una comedia romántica entre un chico inocente y una chica lobo que pertenecen a diferentes razas!
description.ja: 高校入学を機に、初恋の幼馴染・河流と再会した少年・望月。入学早々、学園の高嶺の花となった河流にぎくしゃくしてしまう望月だが、とある事件をきっかけに彼女の「秘密」を知ってしまい――!?
description.pt-br: A vida escolar de Mochizuki tomou um rumo interessante repentinamente quando ele reencontrou sua amiga de infância, Tsukimi Kawaru, por quem ele tinha uma queda desde o ensino fundamental. Por um acidente do destino, ele descobriu que Kawaru era na verdade uma garota-lobo, que não conseguia se controlar perto dele. Como Kawaru quebrou sua promessa de se manter sob controle, sua irmã, Utsuru, decidiu levá-la de volta para casa, mas Mochizuki não gostou dessa ideia e elaborou uma solução para permitir que Kawaru continuasse frequentando o ensino médio enquanto mantinha sua identidade em segredo...

title.en: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.

altTitles.ja: 高度に発達した医学は魔法と区別がつかない

altTitles.ja-ro: Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku wa Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai
Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku ha Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai

altTitles.en: Any Sufficiently Advanced Medical Science Is Indistinguishable From Magic
Highly Advanced Medicine Is Indistinguishable From Magic
I Used High-Level Medicine to Counter Magic

altTitles.ne: उच्च विकसित औषधी जादू भन्दा कम छैन

altTitles.es-la: La medicina altamente desarrollada no se puede diferenciar de la magia

description.en:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
description.ja: 医療魔法が独占された異世界に転移した現役医師・天海唯人。スライム、キマイラ、獣人…はじめて出会う住人たちに驚きながらも、わずかな医療器具と自身の知識で、病魔や怪我に立ち向かう。果たして彼は異世界の住人たちを治療し、苦しむ人々を救うことができるのか。
description.es-la:
¿Funciona la medicina moderna en otro mundo? Sin trampas ni equipos modernos. Un médico se enfrenta a un mundo dominado por la magia. El doctor Amami Yuito es transferido a un mundo diferente donde la magia médica está monopolizada. Slimes, quimeras, hombres bestia... Le sorprenden los habitantes con los que se encuentra por primera vez, pero con el poco equipo médico que tiene y sus propios conocimientos, es capaz de combatir enfermedades y heridas.
¿Podrá curar a los habitantes del otro mundo y salvar a los que sufren? Una fantasía de "Mundo diferente" x "médico" sin trampas ni equipos modernos, escrita por Tsuda Houkou que además es un médico en funciones e ilustrada por el prometedor Takishita Nobuhide!

altTitles.ja: ゲーセン少女と異文化交流

altTitles.ja-ro: Game Center Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu

altTitles.ja: Cultural Exchange With Game Center Girl

altTitles.en: Cultural Exchange With A Game Center Girl
Cross-Cultural Exchange With the Girl at the Arcade

altTitles.zh: 与游戏中心的少女异文化交流的故事

altTitles.zh-hk: 與遊戲中心的少女異文化交流的故事

description.en: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

altTitles.en: A Classmate With Fierce Eyes

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

title.en: Fan ni Gachikoi Suru Idol to, Idol ni Shiotaiou na Fan.

altTitles.ja: ファンにガチ恋するアイドルと、アイドルに塩対応なファン。

altTitles.ja-ro: Fan ni Gachikoi Suru Aidoru to, Aidoru ni Shiotaiouna Fan.

altTitles.en: An Idol Who's Super in Love with Her Fan and a Fan Who's Cold to His Idol

description.en: Ririka is an unpopular idol who is in love with a fan named Suzuki. She tries various ways to get his attention, but Suzuki's reactions are always cold. However, Ririka's love is so strong that she is determined to do whatever it takes to make him look her way.
description.ja: 売れないアイドルのリリカがベタ惚れしている相手…それは、自分のファンである鈴木。あの手この手でアプローチするけれど、鈴木の反応が激薄で効いているかわからない。でも、強火な推しへの愛がチラ見えする鈴木が最高なので、今日もリリカはファンサ（奇行）を繰り返す！

title.en: Saki-chan wa Konya mo Peko Peko

altTitles.en: Saki the Succubus Hungers Tonight

altTitles.ja: サキちゃんは今夜もぺこぺこ

altTitles.es-la: Saki la súcubo está hambrienta esta noche

description.en: Saki-chan is a beautiful young woman and just a little naive. She may seem harmless as she wanders the streets, but beware–she’s a brand-new succubus who thrives on the lust of men! She’s just…not very good at it yet. When she finds herself with an opportunity to move in with a 30-something man who’s never slept with a woman before, she takes it, just like she’ll take him! Er, eventually. This sweet and sexy comedy about a novice sex demon and her virgin partner will leave you satisfied but always hungry for more.
description.id: Saki adalah gadis yang cantik dan sedikit polos. Dia mungkin tampak tak berbahaya ketika berada di jalan, namun sesungguhnya dia adalah succubus baru yang mencari nafsu laki-laki! Dia… belum bagus dalam hal itu. Akhirnya dia punya kesempatan untuk tinggal bersama laki-laki umur 30-an yang masih perjaka. Ini adalah cerita komedi yang manis dan seksi antara demon seks pemula dan rekan perjakanya yang akan membuatmu puas dan meminta lebih. Dijamin!
description.ja: アパートの前で行き倒れていた巨乳×天然系美少女は、ウブでピュアな新米サキュバスだった！？　彼女は精を吸収しなければならない困った体質で同居することになったオーバー30の童貞男子には、うれしくもキビしー状況に！！
description.es-la: Saki-chan es una joven hermosa y un poco ingenua. Puede parecer inofensiva mientras deambula por las calles, pero ten cuidado: ¡es una súcubo novata que se nutre de la lujuria de los hombres! Aunque todavía no es muy buena en el negocio. Cuando se encuentra con la oportunidad de mudarse con un hombre de treinta y tantos años que nunca antes se había acostado con una mujer, no puede desperdiciarla.

altTitles.ja: アンダーニンジャ

description.en: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

altTitles.en: Only Yesterday

altTitles.ja: おもひでぽろぽろ

description.en: Omohide Poro Poro follows Taeko Okajima, an eleven-year old girl as she goes through life as a fifth-grader in 1966. Made into the studio Ghibli film Only Yesterday.

altTitles.ja: アルスラーン戦記

altTitles.th: ผู้กล้าแห่งอัสลัน

description.en:
As an unnaturally heavy mist descends on the battlefield, King Andragoras and his most valued officers confer among the bodies of dead and dying soldiers. When Daryoon, a young but highly skilled officer, voices his reluctance to send men into battle under these conditions, the king, unstable and enraged, banishes him.  
Now, Daryoon's new mission is to insure the safety of the King's only son, Prince Arislan. Daryoon and Prince Arislan set off on a quest of their own, but they can't succeed alone. They must convince both the Lord Narsus and his companion, the archer Elam, to join them in their quest to somehow help the soldiers win the war.  
  
Now a group of only six they must somehow overcome an enemy of 300,000 soldiers! These unlikely soldiers have fate on their side, so anything can happen!
description.ja: 国が燃えている…。世界はどれだけ広いのか？　強国「パルス」の王子・アルスラーンは、いまだ何者でもなく、ただ好奇心にあふれていた。「頼りない」「気弱」「器量不足」と言われたアルスラーンが14歳になった時、遠国の異教徒がパルスへ侵攻。アルスラーンは初陣の時を迎える。パルス軍の強さは古今無双。この戦もパルスの圧勝に終わると誰もが信じていた……。奈落へと落ちたアルスラーンの運命！
description.ru: Данное произведение является адаптацией новеллы «Сказание об Арслане». Манга повествует о молодом, неопытном, и все еще неуверенном в себе принце по имени Арслан. В возрасте 14 лет он вместе с отцом отправляется в свой первый поход, который и оказывается для него роковым. Это история о том, как молодой принц взрослеет и становится настоящим королем. История о том, как он будет доказывать всему миру, кто он такой.
description.pt-br: A história gira em torno do príncipe Arslan, que após escapar de uma guerra que devastou seu país, decide reunir um grupo de aliados que almejam o mesmo que ele: a busca por vingança. Para isso, eles vão precisar formar um exército para vencer os milhares de soldados que invadiram Pals, a terra natal de Arslan, controlados por Lord Silver Mask, que voltou para tomar posse do trono e governar Pals.

altTitles.ja: ヘルシング

altTitles.en: Hellsing: The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of the Vampire Hunter

description.cs:
Hellsing je temnou a krvavou výpravou do světa, kde je hranice mezi lidskostí a monstrozitou velmi tenká. V centru dění stojí agentura Hellsing, tajná společnost, zasvěcená ochraně Britského impéria před nadpřirozenými hrozbami. Ředitelkou této agenturu je mladá a odhodlaná lady Integral Fairbrook Wingates van Hellsing, která vládne nejen pomocí své železné vůle, ale také pomocí svých věrných spojenců – Alukard, upír s temnou minulostí a znepokojivě ničivou silou. Viktorie Serasová, mladá naivní policistka, která se upírem stala teprve nedávno a Walter C. Dornez, starý anglický komorník, jehož síla a moudrost nemusí být na první pohled zcela patrná.
 
Příběh sleduje střet mezi Hellsingem a jeho nepřáteli, ať už jde o šílené upíry, fanatické náboženské organizace či dlouho zapomenuté síly, jenž se vymykají běžnému lidskému chápání. Temná atmosféra, výstřední postavy, akce a břitký humor dodávají příběhu jedinečný rytmus, kde krveprolití, vtip a hlubší podtóny jdou ruku v ruce.
description.en:
Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---
description.es: La familia Van Helsing ha sido la némesis del conde Drácula y de toda la raza de vampiros.Ahora se ha convertido en toda una organización cuyo mejor cazador,un vampiro,usará el humor y la violencia para cumplir su destino...y ha dado origen a una exitosa serie de animación.
description.fr: En Angleterre, l'organisation secrète Hellsing agit pour protéger le pays des forces du mal, dont les vampires. Force de frappe de l'Église protestante, ce groupe dispose d'une arme secrète des plus inattendues: Alucard, vampire surpuissant et apparemment invulnérable. Mais leur mission se corsera quand ils devront faire face au Vatican et aux brigades anti-monstres de l'État le plus petit du monde...
description.hu: A Hellsing Királyi Protestáns Lovagrend az Angol Korona évszázados szervezete – egy család, amelynek a feladata a birodalom védelme a természetfeletti és istentelen veszedelmektől. A lovagrend lelke Sir Integra Wingates Hellsing, legfőbb fegyvere pedig Alucard, a szervezet szolgálatában álló titokzatos ősvámpír, valamint – újabban – Seras Victoria, egy balul elsült bevetésen született vámpírlány.
description.it: Londra, un'antica casata nobiliare combatte contro i vampiri da generazioni; si tratta dell'agenzia segreta HELLSING, comandata da Lady Integra Farbuke Wingates Hellsing.Integra, succeduta alla morte del padre, stipula un patto di sangue con il on il vampiro Alucard e lo induce a battersi contro le tremende forze occulte che minacciano il pianeta, dando vita a una delle saghe horror più famose nel panorama dei manga.
description.ja: 幽霊船デメテル号に乗ってアーカードが遂に来た！かくして役者は全員演壇へと登り、暁の惨劇は幕を上げる・・・・・・
description.lt:
Kažkur Anglijoje gyvuoja slapta organizacija, sukurta tam, kad apgintų karalienę ir šalį nuo įvairiausio plauko pabaisų. Sveiki atvykę į paslaptingąjį Hellsing – organizaciją, kuri žino, kaip spręsti problemas, kai iš tamsos išnyra vampyrai, gūlai ir kitokios šlykštynės. Be to, organizacijos nariai gali pasigirti puikiu ginklu.

Klausiate, kokiu? Ogi kitu vampyru, kuris šimtmečius tobulino savąjį kovos meną ir todėl yra bemaž neįveikiamas. Apsiginklavęs milžinišku pistoletu, užtaisytu ypatingomis sidabrinėmis kulkomis, Alukardas kelia siaubą ne tik nemirėliams. Tačiau ne tai svarbiausia. Skaitytoją visų pirma priblokš kandus šių istorijų sąmojis, neįtikėtinos iliustracijos ir beprotiškai kruvinas veiksmas. Nenuostabu, jog ši manga užkariavo visą pasaulį.
description.pt: Para resolver o caso de um estranho pastor de hábitos macabros, é chamada a Organização Hellsing, responsável por livrar a Inglaterra dos males que espreitam na noite. Alucard é a principal arma da Hellsing contra estes seres, e sua história se cruza com a da novata Seras Victoria e a da chefe da organização, Integra Wingates Hellsing.
description.ru: Вампир Алукард - древний и могущественный, вампир "в самом расцвете сил". Все что его интересует - это поиски по-настоящему сильного противника. Убивать и умирать - какие еще могут быть развлечения в бессмертной жизни? И организация "Хеллсинг", члены которой посвятили себя борьбе с порождениями тьмы вроде него. Что может их связывать кроме желания уничтожить друг друга? Но, как ни странно, Алукард и Хеллсинг прекрасно работают вместе… и будут работать ровно до тех пор, пока древний вампир не найдет для себя действительно могущественного и интересного врага.
description.tr:
Hortlaklar, vampirler, canavarlar... Kraliyet Protestan Şövalyeler Kardeşliği, yani Hellsing, onlarla kadim zamanlardan beri mücadele ediyor. Nasıl mı? Tabii ki yüksek teknoloji ürünü silahlar ve ekipmanla... Üstelik bunları kullanan kişi tam bir vampir uzmanı. Hellsing sizi aksiyon ve kan yüklü bir dünyaya davet ediyor.

Bu sayıda Hellsing Organizasyonu'nun avlarıyla ve düşmanlarıyla tanışıyoruz. Hiç beklenmeyen bazı gelişmeler, Integra Hellsing'in tüm planlarını bozuyor. Üstelik, kurumun yakın geçmişinde yaşanan güç oyunları ve entrikalar da karşımıza çıkıyor. Bakalım Hellsing bütün bu olanlarla başa çıkabildi mi ve olacaklarla başa çıkabilecek mi?
description.es-la: Llega uno de los mayores éxitos de los últimos años! Hellsing, una organización auspiciada por el gobierno británico, controlada por la implacable Integra, busca exterminar a los despiadados vampiros, cuya actividad va en aumento y causa pánico en la población. Su principal arma es Alucard, un sádico vampiro liberado por Integra después de años de reclusión. Junto a él, Victoria Seras, una chica policía ahora mitad vampiro. El peligro? Una posible guerra mundial. Mucho más explícito, violento, humorístico y adulto que la serie de TV.

title.en: Kamiina Botan, Yoeru Sugata wa Yuri no Hana.

altTitles.en: Kamiina Botan, the Drunken Form is a Lily Flower

altTitles.ja: 上伊那ぼたん、酔へる姿は百合の花

description.en:
Kamiina Botan is a 20-year-old college student.   
At the welcome party for the dorm she was assigned to, the dorm leader Ibuki gives her a highball to drink and she becomes tipsy, leading to her involvement with Ibuki from now on…  
A tipsy teasing girl's comedy!  
  
Official Manga Twitter: [@Kamiina Botan](https://twitter.com/kamiinabotan)
description.ja: 二十歳の大学生・上伊那ぼたんは酔うと少し大胆になってドキッとする一言を…? これが令和の“読むアルコール”。 上伊那ぼたんに酔いしれましょ。

altTitles.ja: Tsue to Tsurugi no Wistoria
杖と剣のウィストリア

altTitles.vi: Bản Hùng ca Kiếm và Pháp Trượng

description.en: The new, magical dungeon-adventure fantasy series from the author of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Seeking to fulfill a promise to a childhood friend, Will Serfort enters Regarden Magical Academy with the goal of making it to the top of the magical world. There’s just one problem: he can’t use magic! Will his sword skills be the key to unlocking his true potential?
description.pt-br: A nova série de fantasia mágica e de aventura em masmorras do autor de "É Errado Tentar Pegar Garotas em um Calabouço?" segue a jornada de Will Serfort. Buscando cumprir uma promessa feita a uma amiga de infância, Will ingressa na Academia Mágica de Regarden com o objetivo de alcançar o topo do mundo mágico. Mas há um problema: ele não pode usar magia! Serão suas habilidades com a espada a chave para desbloquear seu verdadeiro potencial?

description.en: Who needs a Class when you're already the strongest anyways? Ten years ago, Amelia woke up in a broken world where she had to fight for her survival. Now, after defeating the Void itself and escaping the abyss, she's finally found her way back into the real world. But instead of returning to Earth, she arrives in Vacuos — a fantasy world governed by a System as if it were a video game. And when rewarded with a Class befitting her accomplishments— to become a powerful [Hero] that will forever dedicate her life to protecting this world that is not her own— she only has one response. “Absolutely not. I’m going to live a normal life now, thank you very much.”
description.pt-br:
Quem precisa de uma Classe quando você já é a mais forte de qualquer maneira? Dez anos atrás, Amelia acordou em um mundo quebrado onde ela teve que lutar por sua sobrevivência. Agora, depois de derrotar o próprio Vazio e escapar do abismo, ela finalmente encontrou seu caminho de volta para o mundo real. 
Mas em vez de retornar à Terra, ela chega em Vacuos — um mundo de fantasia governado por um Sistema como se fosse um videogame. 
E quando recompensada com uma Classe condizente com suas realizações — para se tornar uma poderosa [Heroína] que dedicará sua vida para sempre a proteger este mundo que não é o dela — ela só tem uma resposta. 
"Absolutamente não. Vou viver uma vida normal agora, muito obrigada."

altTitles.en: I Have an Apocalyptic Underground City
I Have a Post-Apocalyptic Dungeon

description.en:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~

altTitles.ja: 転生したら才能があった件～ 異世界行っても努力する～（コミック）

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated with Talent: I'll Work Hard Even If I Go to Another World

description.en:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.
description.ja: いくら努力しても報われない浪人生は、コンビニの女性店員とともに強盗を捕縛しようとした瞬間、異世界に転生することになってしまった。神様に“努力をしたらしただけ恵まれる才能”を望むんだところ、レベルアップに人より3倍の経験値が必要だが、確実に人より成長できる【天賦】と他者や物を鑑定できる【天眼】のスキルをもらうことになった。準男爵家の次男・マルスとして転生し、努力を重ねてステータスを伸ばしていたが、街の近くで魔物が溢れるスタンピードの前兆が見られて……。異世界転生努力ファンタジー、ここに開幕！

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染はもうやめる

altTitles.en: Let's Stop Being Childhood Friends Already

description.en:
Since he was a child, Madoka has been in love with Tamaki.

However, high school student Madoka is always regarded by college student Tamaki as a “cute younger childhood friend” and not as an object of romantic interest.

As time goes by, Madoka graduates from high school and goes to the same university as Tamaki without telling him, and succeeds in renting an apartment next to his.

Then, Madoka begins to make a fierce appeal to Tamaki.

title.en: Sachiiro no One Room Gaiden - Seikai no Meitantei

altTitles.ja: 幸色のワンルーム　外伝　正壊の名探偵
正壊の名探偵

altTitles.en: One Room of Happiness Spin-off - The Corrupt Detective
The Corrupt Detective

altTitles.pl: Pokój w kolorach szczęścia. Genialny detektyw Matsubase

altTitles.ru: Цвета счастья в одной комнате: коррумпированный детектив

description.en:
This is the story of Detective Matsubase three years before he fatefully meets xxx.

Hijiri Matsubase finally quits the police force and fulfills his dream of running his own detective agency. However, life isn't smooth sailing as it seems and the poor guy is in massive debt after getting scammed. Luckily, or unluckily for Matsubase… Aketoyo, the son of a billionaire reaches out to him for a deal. "Entertain me, I'll pay you $100,000 per case." A deal with the devil can be oh so enticing.  
(source: AOC Translations)

altTitles.ja: ウルフちゃんは澄ましたい

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Wants to Be Clear

altTitles.id: Gadis Serigala Mencoba Untuk Berpura pura Tidak Peduli

altTitles.en: Wolf-chan Is Trying to Feign Indifference

description.en:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
description.ja: ウルフカットで一匹狼なクール系女子の尊い片想い！
description.pt-br: A loba solitária fria, e seu precioso amor não correspondido!

altTitles.en: Hetalia World Stars Gangsta

description.en: Official Hetalia AU. "This world, although similar to the one we know of, is just slightly different. Data-wise, it's pretty much the same thing, just a lot more punk and grunge-like this time. 200 crowded districts, each with a unique culture and history of their own, each with a boss in charge, in a spinning circle of harmony and chaos. Yet a new disruption was about to arise."

altTitles.ja: みいちゃんと山田さん

description.en:
Shinjuku, 2012. Yamada, who works as a hostess in a night club, meets Mii-chan, a new girl who is no good at anything she does. Mii-chan is energetic and motivated, but she can't read kanji or the atmosphere, so she is ridiculed by those around her and labeled as "pitiful." Nevertheless, Yamada is gradually drawn to Mii-chan as she works diligently.

(Translated from Magazine Pocket.)

(Originally serialised on X/Twitter under a pseudonym and released in collected volumes on Kindle. The original manga began with shorts, then ran "Mii-chan and Yamada-san" as a lengthier story. This is a reboot with the same basic premise. The author worked in a hostess club when she was in college, but has publicly stated in interviews and on social media that while there was a "Mii-chan" who served as the inspiration for the character, everything else about the story is fictional.)

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

altTitles.en: Yuria's Red String

altTitles.ja: ゆりあ先生の赤い糸

description.en:
Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home, where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital, Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover.

Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.

title.en: Menhera Usagi wa Yandere Ookami ni Dekiaisareru

altTitles.ja: メンヘラうさぎはヤンデレ狼に溺愛される

altTitles.en: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

altTitles.en: Return of the Mount Hua Sect
Return of Sword Master
Volcanic Return

altTitles.th: หวนคืนสู่ฮวาซาน

altTitles.en: Return of the Flowery Mountain Sect

altTitles.pt-br: Retorno da seita do monte hua

altTitles.es-la: El regreso de la secta del monte hua

description.en:
Chung Myung, The 13th Disciple of the Mount Hua Sect, One of the 3 Great Swordsmen, Plum Blossom Sword Saint, defeated Chun Ma, who has brought destruction and disarray onto the world. 

After the battle, he breathes his last breath on top of the headquarter mountain of the Heavenly Demon Sect. 

He is reborn after 100 years in the body of a child. ……What? The Mount Hua Sect has fallen? What kind of nonsense is that!?

---

**Links:**
- [Animated PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZHTcZsg975A)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/jianzunguilai/list?title_no=2695)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/ANCIENTCHINESE/jianzunguilai/list?title_no=1639)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/sword-master/list?title_no=2899)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/return-of-the-blossoming-blade/list?title_no=3029)
description.id: Murid ke-13 dari sekte Hwasan, Cheong Myeong, si pendekar pedang sakti bunga plum akhirnya berhasil membunuh kepala dari sekte iblis, Cheonma. Namun pertarungan tersebut telah merenggut nyawa Cheong Myeong sendiri beserta seluruh sekte Hwasan yang menjadi tempat perguruannya. Siapa yang menyangka, setelah kematiannya ternyata Cheong Myeong terlahir kembali 100 tahun kemudian! Tapi di masa ini tidak ada seorang pun yang mengingat Sekte Hwasan?! "...Apa? Sekte Hwasan hancur?!"
description.it:
Chung Myung, il 13esimo discepolo della Mount Hua Sec, uno dei 3 grandi spadaccini, Il santo della spada del fiore del pruno sconfisse Chun Ma, colui che ha portato distruzione e caos nel mondo.
Dopo la battaglia, esala il suo ultimo respiro in cima alla montagna del quartiere generale della Heavenly Demon Sect.

Ma, dopo 100 anni rinasce nel corpo di un bambino.
....Cosa? La mont Hua Sec è scomparsa? Cosa sta succedendo?
description.ko:
대 화산파 13대 제자.천하삼대검수 매화검존 청명.
천하를 혼란에 빠뜨린 고금제일마 천마의 목을 치고 십만대산의 정상에서 영면.
백 년의 시간을 뛰어넘어 아이의 몸으로 다시 살아나다.
......뭐? 화산이 망해? 이게 뭔 개소리야!?
description.ru:
13-й ученик великой школы Хуашань, один из трех величайших фехтовальщиков в мире - благородный клинок цветущей сливы Чхон Мён.
Последним ударом клинка он убивает Чхонма, повергшего весь мир в хаос, и погибает на вершине горы из голов тысячи демонов.
А спустя 100 лет он перерождается в теле ребенка, чтобы возродить из пепла некогда одну из самых великих, но ныне всеми забытую школу Мурима - Хуашань.
Цветки сливы рано или поздно опадают. Однако когда приходит холодная зима, а за ней - весна, слива распускается в своем полном великолепии.
description.th: สงครามกับเทพมารสิ้นสุดแล้ว และความตายที่ไม่อาจเลี่ยงได้กำลังคืบคลานมาหาข้าเช่นกัน ข้าผู้เป็นศิษย์รุ่น 13 แห่งฮวาซานได้ปลิดชีพเทพมารที่สั่นคลอนทั่วพิภพลงได้ในที่สุด และสิ้นสุดอายุขัยบนจุดสูงสุดของยอดเขา ...แต่พอข้าลืมตาขึ้นอีกที กลับกลายเป็นยาจกไร้กำลัง นี่ข้ากลับมาเกิดใหม่เป็นขอทานหรือนี่?!
description.zh:
剑尊大战魔尊后同归于尽！
百年后竟重生成柔弱孩童？
男主清明前世是闻名江湖的华山派梅花剑尊，耗尽全力消灭了武林魔头“天魔”，最终与其同归于尽。但他却在百年后重生成了一个落魄小乞丐，并且保留着前世所有记忆。而在现世，曾是江湖名派的“华山派”已经没落至无人知晓的地步，清明得知这一事实后不能接受。当他找到华山后，发现门派已油尽灯枯。但清明仍然还记得百年前门派的道义和武学精神，他很不甘心，于是以孩童之身重新拜入华山派门下。但入门后他才知道，原来门派没落竟与前世自己和天魔大战有关！孩童之身的他该如何重振门派雄风呢？
description.zh-hk: 華山派梅花劍尊青明與天魔同歸於盡後，再次醒來發現百年後的華山派竟已不屬於九派一幫，震驚之下他立志要讓華山派重振當年盛極一時的威風!

altTitles.en: Orca Baby, the Mastermind
A Villainous Baby Killer Whale
Black Killer Whale Baby
The Mastermind Orca Baby
The Éminence Grise Orca Baby

altTitles.ja: シャチ族の赤ちゃん公女様、人生逆転します！

description.en:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and this is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragon’s power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but the latter doesn’t recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.

---
At age 3, Calypso Aquasiadel is the most outstanding genius her family's ever seen, and no wonder... She's actually a modern girl who's been reborn into the same novel thrice! This time around, Calypso's determined to harness the powers of the mysterious dragon duke and send herself back home. The only problem is, she'll first need to earn the respect of her hardened family to survive until then! Can Calypso win their approval and even their hearts? Or is this life doomed for another do-over?
description.es-la:
Un día, un niño pequeño apareció ante mí. “¿Sabes dónde está la academia? ¡Tengo que ir ahí! “ “Has estado yendo en la dirección equivocada todo este tiempo. “ ” !!! “ “¿Qué está mirando, señor?” Supongo que esta es mi hija. "¿Quieres uno?" Pero no creo que ella sepa que soy su padre... Probablemente estés pensando eso, ¿verdad? ¡Si crees eso, estás equivocado, papá! Mi nombre es Calypso, un regresor cuatro veces. Mi vida se arruinó cuando poseí un personaje de novela. ¡Incluso tuve un hijo! ¡El tercer episodio de mi vida fue un final de masacre! '¡Ustedes XX chicos que están locos por esta protagonista femenina!' Sin embargo, por alguna razón, no importa lo que haga, no puedo pasar de mi cumpleaños número 22 y regresar a mi mundo. 
Sin embargo, accidentalmente encontré una manera en la tercera partida cuando el dragón se salió de control y murió. Cuando el dragón corre desenfrenado, ¡la dimensión se distorsiona! ¿Puedo volver a la casa en la que viví durante eso? La cuarta vez, cuando regresé nuevamente, decidí usar este dragón. ¿Abby? ¿Hermanos mayores? ¡Todo es solo un trampolín para encontrarte con el dragón! "¡Espera, dragón!" [Quiero morir ahora, pero me estoy volviendo loco con todos estos retornos repetidos.] [Mi familia está ligada a la familia real] [¿Alguien ha oído hablar alguna vez de los débiles?/ Sólo los más fuertes son felices]

title.en: Omoi Omoi Ai - Jirai Joshi to Yandere Danshi

altTitles.ja: オモイオモイアイ～地雷女子とヤンデレ男子～

altTitles.ja-ro: Omoiomoiai - Jirai Joshi to Yandere Danshi

description.en: “I like you I adore you I love you I love you so much 24/7 365 days a year.” On Christmas Eve, Nemu got dumped because “her love was too suffocating”. But then she noticed a man being dumped for the same reason…!? This is the long-awaited first volume of the super popular obsessive love comedy from Bessatsu Margaret ♪
